remarks: The meet of distinct atoms is zero.  ( ~ atnemeq0 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2012.)
statement:
atnem0.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
atnem0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
atnem0.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atnem0 $p |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> ( P =/= Q <-> ( P ./\ Q ) = .0. ) ) $.
